                        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangExit
        Gets the process running
        Throws:
        OtpAlreadyStartedException - if a process with this name is already running

        Parameters:
        caller - Process that starts this one
        Throws:
        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangExit - if this process can't be linked to the caller

      • handleExit

        protected void handleExit(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangExit oee)
                   throws com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangExit,
                          OtpStopException
        Override this function if you want to trap exits
        Parameters:
        oee - Exit reason
        Throws:
        com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangExit - If you want to re-throw the exception
        OtpStopException - If you want to stop the server
